title: Airlift is master piece
review: OK what is trend of Bollywood films? hero heroine item song boring ending? But this movie deserve a lot.But this film airlift is so much real . No unnecessary songs. And the best thing about this film is its message and morality given to all the people.There are some scenes which makes so much mystery. There is feeling of humanity and much more. You will also see how much careless can a government can be? Actually this film indeed reflect our society . It shows person should be great by his heart not by money. This film also illustrate before saying religions , person from particular country first we need to treat them as human.And also this film shows how to life is full of mystery and struggle. We can also imagine how people are living in such country ?Thank You all team of airlift for giving such a nice film.
